Class WorkRequestManagementPage

java.lang.Object
application.WorkRequestManagementPage
public class WorkRequestManagementPage extends Object
WorkRequestManagementPage provides an interface for administrators and staff to view, filter, and manage work requests within the system. This page displays all work requests with filtering options by status and time period.

  • Nested Class Summary

    WorkRequest class to hold work request data for the table view.

  • Method Details

    • createScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene createScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User user)
      Displays the work request management page in the provided primary stage. This method creates and configures the UI components including filters, table view, and action buttons for managing work requests.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage where the scene will be displayed.
      databaseHelper - An instance of DatabaseHelper to handle database operations.
      user - The current user who is accessing the page.
      Returns:
      The scene object that has been created.

    • createFilterSection

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createFilterSection()
      Creates the filter section with status and time period filters.
      Returns:
      A VBox containing the filter controls.

    • createWorkRequestTable

      private void createWorkRequestTable()
      Creates the table view for displaying work requests.

    • createButtonSection

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createButtonSection(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Creates the button section with action buttons for work request management.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage for navigation.
      Returns:
      An HBox containing the action buttons.

    • openChatDetail

      private void openChatDetail(WorkRequestManagementPage.WorkRequest workRequest)
      Opens a chat detail view for the selected work request.
      Parameters:
      workRequest - The selected work request whose chat to open

    • loadWorkRequests

      private void loadWorkRequests()
      Loads work requests from the database based on current filters.

    • applyFilters

      private void applyFilters()
      Applies filters to the work requests based on status and time selections.

    • updateFilterStatusLabel

      private void updateFilterStatusLabel()
      Updates the filter status label to reflect current filter settings.

    • assignWorkRequest

      private void assignWorkRequest(WorkRequestManagementPage.WorkRequest request) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      request - The work request to assign.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • showUpdateStatusDialog

      private void showUpdateStatusDialog(WorkRequestManagementPage.WorkRequest request)
      Shows a dialog for updating the status of a work request.
      Parameters:
      request - The work request to update.

    • sendStatusUpdateMessage

      private void sendStatusUpdateMessage(int chatId, int senderId, int requesterId, String status, int requestId, String staffName)
      Sends an automated message to the requester about the status update.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      senderId - The ID of the user sending the message (staff member)
      requesterId - The ID of the requester
      status - The new status of the work request
      requestId - The ID of the work request
      staffName - The name of the staff member updating the status

    • sendStatusUpdateMessage

      private void sendStatusUpdateMessage(int chatId, int senderId, int requesterId, String status, int requestId, String staffName, String notes)
      Sends an automated message to the requester about the status update with additional notes.
      Parameters:
      chatId - The ID of the chat
      senderId - The ID of the user sending the message (staff member)
      requesterId - The ID of the requester
      status - The new status of the work request
      requestId - The ID of the work request
      staffName - The name of the staff member updating the status
      notes - Additional notes provided with the status update (can be null)

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type, String title, String content)
      Shows an alert dialog with the specified type, title, and content.
      Parameters:
      type - The alert type.
      title - The alert title.
      content - The alert content.
